titleStmt.title: Of sinnes of vveaknesse, vvilfulnesse and appendant to it, a paraphrasticall explication of two difficult texts, Heb. 6 and Heb. 10 / by Henry Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [34]: Of a late, or, a death-bed repentance.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
